mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pa_score_detail(phone, CR_TR_TR_LM24, CR_CC_CS_LM03, CR_PS_MC_LM24, CD_CC_AL_LM12, CR_DC_OGO2_LM12, CD_AL_IS_LM24, CR_EX_EP_LM06) values(#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_tr_tr_lm24, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_cc_cs_lm03, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_ps_mc_lm24, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cd_cc_al_lm12, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_dc_ogo2_lm12, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cd_al_is_lm24, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_ex_ep_lm06, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
